Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Commandant, expanding the base is priority number one. We should deploy defenses outside as well.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Time's of the essence. We're about to be dispatched on our next mission.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "We need to repair the base before then, or we'll be in a world of hurt.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "I've been wanting to do inventory and confirm the layout of the interior. Commandant, you supervise the construction of the periphery.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'You mean those turrets?', 3: '11', 4: "I'll try my best.", 5: '12'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Oh, so you heard. That makes this easier. After all, I can't really just rely on Kamui and Nanami to get the job done...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Just keep an eye out since this isn't your area of expertise. I can't really just rely on Kamui and Nanami to get the job done...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "I'll send you the procedure and the completed rendering, Commandant. Just be sure that they don't make a mess of things.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Looks like we're still short-staffed...", 3: '15', 4: "I'll be counting on you later!", 5: '16'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'One more member should help... But this is a job for a professional...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "If only I had the time! You can't just rely on me to do it all!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Wait... Are you inviting me to stay with the Gray Ravens?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Why?! I'm just a member of the Engineering Force.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "I knew it! I don't work for free!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "But if I have some free time, that's a different story...", 4: '1'}
